Lyric:
[by:莎士比亚书店]
[00:03.19]I've got fire for a heart I'm not scared of the dark
[00:07.33]You've never seen it look so easy
[00:10.50]I got a river for a soul and baby you're a bow
[00:14.70]Baby you're my only reason
[00:17.32]If I didn't have you there would be nothing left
[00:20.88]A shell of a man that could never be his best
[00:24.36]If I didn't have you I'd never see the sun
[00:28.00]You taught me how to be someone yeah
[00:31.80]All my life you stood by me when no one else was ever behind me
[00:39.10]All these lights that can't blind me
[00:43.03]With your love nobody can drag me down
[00:46.38]All my life you stood by me when no one else was ever behind me
[00:53.36]All these lights that can't blind me
[00:57.39]With your love nobody can drag me down
[01:03.32]Nobody nobody
[01:05.99]Nobody can drag me down
[01:10.55]Nobody nobody
[01:13.20]Nobody can drag me down
